title: Simplying mosquito behaviour surveillance
text: **NOTE: package early phase development…stay tuned! goal segmEnto show mosquito behaviour surveillance can simplified trapping mosquitoes longer time segments, rather every hour. package, can test influence time segments choice estimate important metric - proportion bites averted insecticide-treated nets (ITNs) - phi-B.

title: Simplying mosquito behaviour surveillance
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(segmEnto) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
